execution_plan.description: Find IDs of goods that have price greater than 10 in the goods database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id FROM goods WHERE price > 10;

execution_plan.description: Get receipt numbers that have the earliest date in the receipts database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT ReceiptNumber FROM receipts WHERE Date = (SELECT MIN(Date) FROM receipts);

execution_plan.description: Get distinct receipt numbers from items that reference the goods found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT Receipt FROM items WHERE Item IN ($step1.id);
